entities.description: Indicator of the recency of crack use based on questionnaire data or statistically imputed data.
Indicator of the recency of heroin use based on questionnaire data or statistically imputed data.
Revised indicator for the recency of heroin use within various time frames.
Indicator of the recency of hallucinogen use based on questionnaire data or statistically imputed data.
Revised indicator for the recency of hallucinogen use within various time frames.
Revised indicator for the recency of LSD use within various time frames.

relationships.description: Indicates the recency of crack use for the respondent utilizing either questionnaire data or statistically imputed data.
Indicates the recency of heroin use for the respondent using either questionnaire data or statistically imputed data.
Provides updated information about the recency of heroin use based on various time periods.
Indicates the recency of hallucinogen use for the respondent utilizing either questionnaire data or statistically imputed data.
Provides updated information about the recency of hallucinogen use based on various time periods.
Provides updated information about the recency of LSD use based on various time periods.
